attributes.title: Call for Hosting MOCO in 2018 & 2019
attributes.author: Jules Françoise
attributes.hook: The MOCO Steering Committee is looking for hosts for MOCO’18 and MOCO’19...

body:
The MOCO Steering Committee is looking for hosts for MOCO’18 and MOCO’19.

If you are interested in hosting a future MOCO Symposium at your institution, please submit a proposal to moco-share@sfu.ca. The guidelines for submission are available in the following document:

MOCO_CallForHosting

The deadline for applications for hosting MOCO’18 is April 30th, 2017. The deadline for applications for hosting MOCO’19 is January 31st, 2018.

Please feel free to contact us at moco-share@sfu.ca for any question.
